attributes.action: Make schools accept private dyslexic assessments
attributes.additional_details: Schools do not always agree to assess pupils who may have dyslexia and perants like me then struggle to get the right support this assessment is available privately but they is nothing to say schools have  to honor these assessments so the children keep suffering please help make it compulsory for schools to accept and honour these assessments so then children can get the support they need in class dyslexia affects children's reading writing and maths it gives them a lack self confedence which then has a knock on affect in over aspects of there life's which then follows the through there adult life to many kids are suffering in silence and to many schools are ignoring the issues put in front of them and this need to change Making schools accept private assessments will change the future for the better for a lot of children in this country every child should be encouraged to reach there full potential
